com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.fragments.adapters.utilities

Class InlineDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.fragments.adapters.utilities.InlineDownloader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener, PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener

    public final class InlineDownloader
extends java.lang.Object
implements PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener, PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener
    It's a kind of util class, we use in the ThumbPhotosAdapter class, it's responsible to download the photo externally with the inline button, and when it's done. it notify witch photo (id and position) have been downloaded. This class is implement OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener and OnImageFileSavedListener listeners.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  InlineDownloader.OnFinishDownloadingListener
      Who want to use this util class, must provide an OnFinishDownloadingListener listener, so we can notify him witch photo have been downloaded, with her id and position.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private android.content.Context context
      A context of the fragment that use the util class
      private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PhotoCache> fullPhotosCaching
      The map that hold all the cached photo (OptimizedMap)
      private static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> inDownloadingProgress
      A set that hold the photos id's that in the progress of downloading and saving right now
      private static LocalPhotosDataSource localPhotosUtil
      A singleton that hold the downloaded photos names.
      private InlineDownloader.OnFinishDownloadingListener onFinishDownloadingListener
      A listener so we can notify when the mission done/fail
      private java.lang.String photoId
      The id of the of the photo you want to download
      private int position
      The position of the photo you ant to download in the list/recycler view

      Constructors

      InlineDownloader(java.lang.String photoId, int position, android.content.Context context, InlineDownloader.OnFinishDownloadingListener onFinishDownloadingListener)
      A constructor to create and init instance of InlineDownloader, that can manage the downloading of the photo and notify when the mission done and succeed to download the photo, and when fail notify with other method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isDownloadingNow(java.lang.String photoId)
      Check if photo with photoId is in the downloading progress right now.
      private void notifyAfterDownloadingProgress()
      After downloading or fail to download the photo, we remove the photoId from the set that hold the current downloading photos (photos in the downloading progress), and then notify that the progress done/fail.
      void onAlreadySaved(PhotoCache photoCache)
      When the photo already saved or another photo with same Id (should never happen), exist in the default downloads folder, we just notify the user with a message (UI message).
      void onError(java.lang.Exception e)
      When fail to cache the photo, and an exception is thrown from any reason.
      void onResult(PhotoCache photoCache)
      Save the image file after we succeed to cache it.
      void onSaved(PhotoCache photoCache)
      When successfully saved the image file, we add the the photo to the singleton that hold all the Id's of the downloaded photos and then notify the user (UI message).
      void onSavingFailed(java.io.IOException e)
      When we fail to save the image file, from any reason, we notify the user with a message.
      void startInlineDownloading()
      Method that start the downloading process

    • Constructor Detail

      • InlineDownloader

        public InlineDownloader(@NonNull
                        java.lang.String photoId,
                        int position,
                        @NonNull
                        android.content.Context context,
                        @NonNull
                        InlineDownloader.OnFinishDownloadingListener onFinishDownloadingListener)
        A constructor to create and init instance of InlineDownloader, that can manage the downloading of the photo and notify when the mission done and succeed to download the photo, and when fail notify with other method.
        Parameters:
        photoId - is the Id of the photo, unique value.
        position - the position of the photo in the list, recycler view.
        context - a context.
        onFinishDownloadingListener - a listener so we can notify when the mission done and succeed to download the photo (call notifyItemDownloaded), or unexpected event accrue we notify with other method, (call notifyUnexpected).

    • Method Detail

      • isDownloadingNow

        public static boolean isDownloadingNow(java.lang.String photoId)
        Check if photo with photoId is in the downloading progress right now.
        Parameters:
        photoId - is the id of the photo you want to check if it downloading right now.
        Returns:
        true if the photo with photoId is downloading/saving right now, false otherwise.
